name: Thanks + Calendly
Pricing Anchor
content:
Hi {first_name},

Thanks for reaching out about {brand_name}! I'd be happy to discuss pricing and packages.

My standard rates start at {base_rate} for {base_deliverables}, but I'm flexible based on your specific needs and budget.

Could you share a bit more about your project requirements and timeline? That way I can provide a more accurate quote.

Best regards,
{my_name}

name: No Thanks
content:
Hi {first_name},

Thank you for thinking of me for {brand_name}! I appreciate you reaching out.

Unfortunately, I'm not able to take on new projects at the moment due to my current workload. I'll keep you in mind for future opportunities though!

Best of luck with your project.

Best regards,
{my_name}
